EmailTemplate.description: Used for 2013 JCI Dealer Program - Go Live email for current WSO accounts that upgrade to OR
EmailTemplate.name: JCI 2013 Go Live Current Upgrade Luxaire
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Website Updates Are Complete!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Luxaire | Yodle
Hello {!Account.00N60000002KwJ5} -
We have completed the updates to your LUXAIRE dealer website. These new website features include:
A new promotions feature Outrank
In addition, you have the ability to customize your dealer site. These customizations include things like:
Adding your company logo, testimonials and "About Us" information Promotions Additional services Adding pictures
The Outrank Product will allow us to help optimize your site so that people can easily find you on the Web! In order to do this, a representative from Yodle will be reaching out to give you more details on Maps Optimization. Outrank includes maps listing claiming on major search engines to increase your exposure on the web and build credibility. Before Yodle can optimize your maps listing, you will receive a postcard from major search engines like Google with a unique verification number. Once you receive these postcards, please contact Yodle with the verification numbers so we can complete your maps set up. Maps verification is a crucial part of optimization that prevents others from changing your maps listing without your confirmation. This process will be reviewed in more detail on your call.
A representative from Yodle will be reaching out to you within the next 7 business days to confirm your information and share more information on Outrank and the pin collection process!
If you would like to add customizations to your dealer site, please contact us at jciwebsites@yodle.com or call 866-607-4050. Please reference the dealer website welcome kit for more information. In addition, if you do not remember your login information or website URL, please email us at jciwebsites@yodle.com or call at 866-607-4050.
Please note that the phone number on your website is a Yodle call tracking number. When someone calls the call tracking number they will be automatically routed to your phone. In the Yodle Dashboard you will be able to listen to all calls that have come to your business via the website.
We look forward to a successful year!
Sincerely, JCI Website Support jciwebsites@yodle.com 866-607-4050
